===Definitions===
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[cross]]; to [[pass]]; to go [[across]]; to [[pass through]]
#* {{zh-x|坐 這 艘 船 過 河 很 安全。|It is safe to '''cross''' the river in this boat.}}
#* {{zh-x|請 您 趕快 過 安檢，現在 已經 登機 了。|Please hurry up to '''pass''' the security check, it's already boarding time.}}
#* {{zh-x|過 了 百貨.公司 便 向 右 拐。|Turn to the right after '''passing''' the department store.}}
# {{lb|zh|of time}} to [[pass by]]; to [[pass]]
#* {{zh-x|時間 過 得{de} 很 快。|Time '''flies''' quickly.}}
#* {{zh-x|過 了 許多 年 我們 才 偶然 相{xiāng}逢。|Many years were to '''pass''' before we [[cross paths|crossed our paths]] again.}}
# to [[spend]] [[time]]; to [[live]]
#* {{zh-x|貧困 迫使 她 過 艱苦 的 生活。|Poverty obliged her to '''live''' a hard life.}}
# to [[go over]]; to [[look]] at [[carefully]]; to [[go through]]
#* {{zh-x|我們 把 這 篇 稿子{zi} 再 過 一遍。|Let's '''go over''' the draft once again.}}
# to [[exceed]]; to [[surpass]]; to be [[over]]
# to [[pass]] an [[exam]]
# {{n-g|[[verbal]] [[complement]]}}
## {{n-g|indicating [[passing]] [[by]]}}; [[over]]; [[by]]
## {{n-g|indicating a [[change]] in [[direction]]}}; [[over]]; [[away]]
## {{n-g|indicating an [[excess]] in [[degree]] or [[amount]]}}; [[past]]; [[through]]; [[by]]
## {{n-g|indicating [[superiority]]}}; [[better]] [[than]]
## {{n-g|indicating [[completion]] or that an [[action]] has [[occur]]red already}}; [[ever]]; [[already]]
##* {{zh-x|你 去 過 ^中國 嗎？|'''Have''' you '''(ever) been''' to China?}}
##* {{zh-x|你 有 冇 去 過 香港 啊{aa3}？|Have you '''ever''' been to Hong Kong?|C-GZ}}
##* {{zh-x|你 見 過 我 個 女朋友 未 呀？|Have you seen my girlfriend yet?|C-GZ}}
# {{n-g|[[adjectival]] [[complement]]}}
## {{lb|zh|chiefly|Cantonese}} {{n-g|indicating an [[excess]] in [[degree]] or [[amount]]}}; [[more]] ... [[than]]
##* {{zh-x|佢 高 過 我。|He/she is tall'''er than''' me.|C-GZ}}
##* {{zh-x|佢 梗係 叻{lek1} 過 我 啦。|He/she is definitely smart'''er than''' me.|C-GZ}}
## {{n-g|indicating that the state has [[exist]]ed in the past}}
# [[too]]; [[excessively]]
#* {{zh-x|他們 抱怨 工資 過 低。|They complained that the wages were '''too''' low.}}
# [[fault]]; [[blemish]]; [[mistake]]
# {{surname|lang=zh}}

====Usage notes====
{{hide box|Usage notes|align=left|
* The past experience particle {{lang|zh|過}} is negated with {{zh-l|沒}}, which is placed before the verb.
*: {{zh-x|我 '''沒''' 去 '''過''' ^中國。|I '''have never been''' to China.}}
** In Cantonese, {{zh-l|未|tr=mei6}} is used instead of {{l|zh|沒}}.}}
